com.accele.gage

Class Resource<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accele.gage.Resource<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of data this Resource will accept and retrieve

    public class Resource<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    An engine-specific resource used by various components throughout the engine. Creating an instance of this class will not retrieve the specified resource; instead the necessary address-related information is saved. The actual data can be retrieved at any time using get().
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    William Garland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Resource(ResourceLoader<T> loader, ResourceLocation src, java.lang.Object... loaderArgs)
      Constructs a Resource with the specified ResourceLoader, ResourceLocation, and any additional loader arguments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T get()
      Calls the ResourceLoader this Resource contains using the saved ResourceLocation and any additional arguments and returns the result.
      ResourceLocation getSrc()
      Returns the ResourceLocation used by this Resource.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Resource

        public Resource(ResourceLoader<T> loader,
                ResourceLocation src,
                java.lang.Object... loaderArgs)
        Constructs a Resource with the specified ResourceLoader, ResourceLocation, and any additional loader arguments. Calling this constructor will not retrieve the specified resource; instead the necessary address-related information is saved. The actual data can be retrieved at any time using get().
        Parameters:
        loader - the ResourceLoader used to retrieve the resource data
        src - the ResourceLocation at which the data is located
        loaderArgs - any additional arguments the loader may require

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public T get()
      throws GAGEException
        Calls the ResourceLoader this Resource contains using the saved ResourceLocation and any additional arguments and returns the result. This method will throw a GAGEException if the loader fails to load the data.
        Returns:
        the data provided by the ResourceLoader
        Throws:
        GAGEException - if the loader fails to load the data

      • getSrc

        public ResourceLocation getSrc()
        Returns the ResourceLocation used by this Resource.
        Returns:
        the ResourceLocation used by this Resource
